body_html:
I played around with the num_units parameter:

1.22 GiB + num_units=100 => ~7 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=75 => ~20 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=50 => ~70 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=25 => ~350 iterations until exception

Seems like some references to the RNN's old internal states are held within tensorflow.

(NOTE: I replicated my finding on SO to incease coverag; still thanks for your trouble.)

body:
I played around with the num_units parameter:

1.22 GiB + num_units=100 => ~7 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=75 => ~20 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=50 => ~70 iterations until exception
1.22 GiB + num_units=25 => ~350 iterations until exception

Seems like some references to the RNN's old internal states are held within tensorflow.

(NOTE: I replicated my finding on SO to incease coverag; still thanks for your trouble.)
